TopicTitle: The science archive shows tons of science reports that I have not done, and some are not possible

Articles.Content:
Hi, just wondering if anyone else has seen this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The Science Archives shows tons of science reports that I have not done. Some are not even possible, like from Mun's or Minmus' upper atmosphere. I am not sure when they get added, I just noticed that there were a lot of them, then later there were even more.

Running KSP 0.90.0.705 (32-bit) on Windows 7, 64-bit.

Thanks!

Well, no responses here but people in IRC say that this might be a stock bug and not mod related.

Either way, I created a workaround. My new TAC Science Archives Fixer deletes all entries with no science earned.

Warning: make sure that you back up your save file before using this! This deletes stuff from the save file, is fairly new, relatively untested, and might cause serious game breaking bugs or data loss.

Download from Github.
